[**EdgeServ.com**](https://edgeserv.com/) is having an early special to get you ready for  Black Friday. Get our best selling 10GB Shared Hosting Plan for **$3.00/year**. 

The discounted pricing will be reflected on the payment page. No promo code necessary!

-----

[**Moonlander Special - 10GB Storage**](https://edgeserv.com/clientarea/cart.php?a=add&pid=359)

* 10GB Storage space
* 300GB Bandwidth
* 4 Addon domains
* 4 Parked domains
* Unlimited email accounts

[**Order Now!**](https://edgeserv.com/clientarea/cart.php?a=add&pid=359)

-----

If you have any questions feel free to message us on our [**live chat**](https://edgeserv.com/clientarea/clientarea.php).

Need more disk space/bandwidth? Open a [**ticket**](https://edgeserv.com/clientarea/submitticket.php), and we'll get you sorted out!
